job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: Job Tittle:-  Site Reliability Engineer Job Location:-  Alpharetta, GA . Job Type: Long term Contract       Responsibilities:      • Run the production environment by monitoring availability and taking a holistic view of system health  • Manage platform infrastructure and applications  • Improve reliability, quality, and time-to-market of our suite of software solutions  • Measure and optimize system performance.  • Provide primary operational support and engineering for multiple large distributed software applications     Requirements:      • Deploy software artifacts to Development, QA, Integration, UAT, Staging, Load and Production environments  • Configure and troubleshoot software runtime environment, provide development support and Incident support  • Lead the rollout, enforcement and continuous improvement of team and enterprise standards  • Configuring Continuous Integration and/or Continuous Delivery pipelines  • Use continuous Integration tools: Jenkins, Sonar, Ant, Maven, Nexus, Rundeck, CHEF, Sonar  • Use of code repository tools like GIT  • Contribute to the design and implementation of our configuration management software architecture  • Design and implementation of tools to streamline SCM, Integration and QA processes  • Define, implement and champion policies to significantly increase the efficiency of our software development/delivery process  • Ensure Continuous Integration and Delivery through SDLC. Work with Development, QA and Operations to guarantee prompt, accurate, and repeatable delivery of the builds  • Provide up-to-date and accurate documentation on the SCM environment and Process Automation tools  • Work closely with Development and Quality Engineering teams  • Experience in one of the clouds (Azure/GCP/AWS).  • Experience in Java based application deployment on application servers like WebSphere and tomcat.  • Experience I vulnerability management and applying software patches  • UAT/Production deployments  • Experience with Agile practices § Good team player and coordination skills  • Candidate should be a Green Card Holder or a US Citizen     Regards  Kajal  IT Recruiter  +1.307-316-7195 |Kajalsaini@noralogic.com|www.noralogic.com  Noralogic | 109 E 17th St, Cheyenne WY 82001  USA: WY, MD, NJ  Mexico: Guadalajara, Monterrey  India: Noida UP  **WBE and MBE company**  ** ISO 9001:2015**  **WY Top 50 Minority owned growing company**
